title: XCOM: Enemy Unknown ipa
description:
***NOTE: Compatible with iPad 2 and up, iPad mini, iPod touch 5 and up and iPhone 4S and up Ã¢â‚¬â€œ WILL NOT RUN ON EARLIER DEVICES***

The award-winning PC and console game of the year comes to Mobile!

Threatened by an unknown enemy, EarthÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s governments unite to form an elite paramilitary organization, known as XCOM. As the commander of XCOM, you must create a fully operational base, research alien technologies, plan combat missions, and lead your soldiers in fierce battles against a terrifying alien invasion. The decisions you make will affect the fate of humanity. You are our last hope.

Key Features:
- Recruit and level-up soldiers
- Discover new weapons and technology
- Play randomly generated missions
- Engage in strategic combat 
- Use enhanced touch controls designed for mobile

***NOTE: XCOM: Enemy Unknown is a graphically rich game with advanced features that is best experienced on the iPad 4 and up. To OPTIMIZE your playing experience, you may also want to turn off other apps before playing.***
